name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Expertise in **C#**, **Angular**, and **T-SQL**, complemented by a solid understanding of **Microservices** and **Service Fabric** architecture. Proven ability to develop and deploy robust applications leveraging **SQL Server** and cloud computing technologies. 
 
Skilled in building AI solutions and implementing customer-focused features while maintaining a strong emphasis on IT security. Demonstrated communication and collaboration strengths enhance cross-functional teamwork, ensuring successful project outcomes. Proficient in the tech stack including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced with cloud-native deployment on **AWS** and **Azure**, alongside expertise in creating **CI/CD pipelines** and maintaining compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
